Package ex2

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
ex2.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class manages the process of reading URLs from a file, initiating download tasks with a thread pool, and handling output formats.

    • Controller

      public Controller(String[] args, Read reader) throws IOException

      args - The arguments containing output format and pool size

  • Method Details

    • registerFactory

      private void registerFactory()
      Registers various output formats in the factory.

    • addFormatOut

      private void addFormatOut()
      Adds output formats based on the provided output format array.

    • readFile

      private void readFile() throws IOException
      Reads the content from the specified source and populates the `urlsIO` map.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading content

    • crawl

      public void crawl() throws InterruptedException
      Starts the crawling process, executing download tasks in the thread pool.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the thread pool is interrupted

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the outputs of the crawling process. If an error occurs, it is printed to stderr.
